about_the_game:
Lootonomicon is a rogue-lite action-RPG set in a world of metal and magic. Embark upon procedurally generated areas, vanquishing hordes of enemies, solving puzzles and bypassing traps, all the while collecting loot for yourself, and The Lootonomicon; The Book of the Loot.

The more loot you discover and pass along to The Lootonomicon, the more geared your characters will start each run.

Features:
- Procedurally generated levels provide replayability.
- Your progress matters. The more loot you find, the more you can gear up before your next run.
- Six varied classes to choose from, each with their own attacks and strengths.
- Play solo, or with another in Local Co-op

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: An old busted, or a new hotness
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes, there are some
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that makes the beep boops
  • Additional Notes: This is not a high end game, and any recent potato should be able to play it.
